Text:
Well, I don't know how many VH fans have ever read this (no comments) but I bet you would also enjoy some Jeff Beck.


http://thepiratebay.org/tor/4127546/Jeff_Beck__amp__Tal_Wilkenfeld_(Complete_Concert_w_info)_2007
thanks for this srw567, i own this on VHS, but my video is broken, will be good to see this concert again
nice to see this still alive

dont care for the sammy!!

 Bring back Roth, Bring back Roth!!
David or Sammy ! Well Van Halen surely rock both world.....And a speedy recovery to Eddie from his cancer ...Thanks Man don't just seed but pray him

I remember seeing them in Hartford a few days before this was recorded. VH was one a very few bands that could sell out shows in Hartford and New Haven in the same week. Given their proximity, most acts would not have tried to book shows in both. After having seen VH in New Haven on the 1984 tour, I was not expecting much. Boy was I wrong, Sammy added a lot more energy, and less ego, to the show. Thanks to srw, I can't wait to watch this. If only they could video tape the parking lot extravaganza Veterans Memorial was  known for.
brings back good memories thanks a bunch !
